mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_summary (cart_id, total_items, total_price) SELECT #{cartId} AS cartId, SUM(ci.quantity) AS totalItems, SUM(ci.price) AS totalPrice FROM cart_items ci JOIN cart i ON ci.cart_id = i.cart_id WHERE ci.cart_id = #{cartId}
